---
title: "T14-2-1 Primary Efficacy Model (Logistic Regression)"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  message: false
---

```{r}
source("rmd/tfl_shells/final/00_tfl_setup.R")

model_rds <- file.path(TFL$results, "primary_model.rds")
tfl_assert_files(model_rds)

m <- readRDS(model_rds)

tab <- summary(m)$coefficients
beta <- tab["trtActive","Estimate"]
se   <- tab["trtActive","Std. Error"]
p    <- tab["trtActive","Pr(>|z|)"]

or <- exp(beta)
ci <- exp(beta + c(-1,1)*1.96*se)

html_path <- file.path(TFL$tables, "primary_model.html")

if (file.exists(html_path)) {
  htmltools::includeHTML(html_path)
} else {
  gtsummary::tbl_regression(m, exponentiate = TRUE)
}

```
